name: Get Ready
description: Front end webpage that gathers information about a location for a user to help prepare for their travel.

name: Team Profile Generator
description: The team profile generator is a NodeJs program which acquires team information from the end user using a series of prompts on the command line interface and creates a html file which displays team member information (email, employee Id etc.).

name: README.md Generator
description: The Read Me Generator is a node js program which takes inputs from the end user to create a professional README.md file that they can use for their own individual or commercial projects.

name: Programming Quiz App
description: A simple quiz made using Javascript designed to test your general knowledge about Javascript!

name: Weather Dashboard
description: Weather dashboard which is able to take any city name and return the current weather as well as a five day forecast.

name: Bootstrap Portfolio
description: Portfolio made using Bootstrap. Contains Bootstrap cards, navbar, jumbotron etc.
